vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 2 to the professional services contract with Lina T. Ramey and Associates, Inc. for additional engineering design services on Wheatland Road from the city limits to University Hills Boulevard - Not to exceed $162,245.18, from $655,815.79 to $818,060.97 - Financing: Street and Transportation (A) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($116,135.18), Water Capital Improvement F Fund ($22,225.02) and Wastewater Capital Improvement G Fund ($23,884.98)
